entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Error when working directory is drive root #38050
  • 'dotnet workload list' CLI command should not download and install workloads without a user permission #38026

Closed

  • Rollback file based workload update fails to upgrade from 8.0.100 to 8.0.101 #37958
    8.0.1xx
  • dotnet templating: Condition on csproj ItemGroup item removes entire line from output #35312
    Discussion
  • dotnet.exe steals -d option from dotnet-* tools starting in .NET 6 #29839
    8.0.2xx
  • EF migration generation on publish fails with artifacts output layout (.net 8) #37422
  • [NETSDKE2E]The directory "C:\Program Files\dotnet\sdk-manifests" could not be deleted after uninstalling 6.0.312 SDK. #37374
  • dotnet watch run --no-hot-reload stops watching for file changes #30140

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #38057
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #38056
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #38055
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #38051
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.3xx] Fix the parsing of ContainerImageTags to report invalid tags instead of silently swallowing them #38048
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-Containers
  • [release/7.0.4xx] Manual backport of #37832 servicing fix #38047
    Servicing-approved, Area-Containers
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #38046
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Fix the parsing of ContainerImageTags to report invalid tags instead of silently swallowing them. #38045
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, 8.0.2

Merged

  • Update manifests when rolling back for install after updating from rollback file #37966
    Servicing-approved, Area-Workloads, 8.0.2xx
  • Install manifests for rollback after update --from-rollback-file #37965
    Servicing-approved, Area-Workloads, 8.0.1xx
  • Ensure dotnet/aspnet base image can be inferred for ASP.Net applications #37996
    Servicing-approved, Area-Containers, 8.0.2xx
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2354609 #37964
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #37999
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #37968
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #37954
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove the workload feature band #37974
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix the parsing of ContainerImageTags to report invalid tags instead of silently swallowing them. #37832
    Servicing-approved, Area-Containers, 8.0.2xx

Updated

  • [WIP] Check PublishSelfContained #37693
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • dotnet tool run and install roll-forward option #37231
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Compute SdkAnalysisLevel Property at the beginning of the SDK Targets #37778
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Workload history 3 #36809
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Remove unneeded strings from an error message #37973
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [release/8.0.2xx] Add dotnet package search #37916
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Identify riscv64 as valid arch #37994
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add filtering to SdkSupportedTargetPlatformVersion validation. Fixes #38016. #38017
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use runtime packs for NativeAOT on .NET 9.0 or higher #37872
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
